00048 class Trigger
00049 { 
00050 public:
00052   AbstractConstraint* constraint;
00054   int info;
00055 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00056   int weight;
00057 #endif
00058   
00059   template<typename T>
00060     Trigger(T* _sc, int _info) : constraint(_sc), info(_info)
00061   {
00062 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00063     weight = _sc->get_vars_singleton()->size();
00064 #endif
00065   }
00066   
00067   Trigger(const Trigger& t) : constraint(t.constraint), info(t.info) 
00068   {
00069 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00070     weight = t.weight;
00071 #endif
00072   }
00073   
00074   Trigger() : constraint(NULL)
00075   {
00076 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00077     weight = 0;
00078 #endif
00079   }
00080   
00081   void inline propagate(DomainDelta domain_data);
00082   void full_propagate();
00083   // In function_defs.hpp.
00084 
00085 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00086   bool operator<(const Trigger &a) const
00087   {
00088     return weight > a.weight;
00089   }
00090 #endif
00091 };

00095 class TriggerRange
00096 {
00098   Trigger* start;
00100   Trigger* finish;
00101 
00102 public:
00103     
00104   Trigger* begin() const
00105   { return start; }
00106   
00107   Trigger* end() const
00108   { return finish; }
00109   
00111 
00113   int data;
00114 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00115   int weight;
00116 #endif
00117   TriggerRange(Trigger* s, Trigger* e, int _data) : start(s), finish(e), data(_data)
00118   { 
00119     D_ASSERT(data >= DomainInt_Min);
00120     D_ASSERT(data <= DomainInt_Max);
00121 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00122     std::sort(s, e);
00123     weight = s->weight;
00124 #endif
00125   }
00126 
00127 #ifdef WEIGHTED_TRIGGERS
00128   bool operator<(const TriggerRange &a) const
00129   {
00130     return weight > a.weight;
00131   }
00132 #endif
00133 };

00136 struct AbstractTriggerCreator
00137 {
00138   Trigger trigger;
00139   TrigType type;
00140   virtual void post_trigger() = 0;
00141   AbstractTriggerCreator(Trigger t, TrigType _type) : trigger(t), type(_type) {}
00142   virtual ~AbstractTriggerCreator()
00143   { }
00144 };
00145 
00150 template<typename VarRef>
00151 struct TriggerCreator : public AbstractTriggerCreator
00152 {
00153   VarRef* ref;
00154   TriggerCreator(VarRef& v, Trigger t, TrigType _type) :
00155     AbstractTriggerCreator(t, _type),  ref(&v)
00156   {}
00157   
00158   virtual void post_trigger()
00159   { ref->addTrigger(trigger, type); }
00160   
00161   virtual ~TriggerCreator()
00162   { }
00163 };
00164 
00165 template<typename VarRef>
00166 inline shared_ptr<AbstractTriggerCreator> 
00167 make_trigger(VarRef& v, Trigger t, TrigType trigger_type)
00168 { return shared_ptr<AbstractTriggerCreator>(new TriggerCreator<VarRef>(v,t, trigger_type));}

00170 #endif
